comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: This will be Joe Chamberlain's third wife, Mary Crowninshield Endicott, daughter of the US Secretary of War, William Crowninshield Endicott, whom he married in 1888. John Singer Sargent painted her portrait. www.jssgallery.org/paintings/Mrs_Joseph_Chamberlain.htm

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thanks for the information.  We will update the record.
